data.message: Em has done better rhymes, I mean "Rap God" alone would make any rapper just throw the mic and get a carrer Flippin burgers at Mickey D's...

replies.message: Or when he flat embarrassed Drake, Lil Wayne, and Kanye with one verse.
Zed Mack you talking about Forever? Cause if so then na, worst verse on the track.
This is 50cents verse
Kenny Lomas your disabled son. Em killed the lot of them
And how many years later was that? Like 10? ... SMH
Lmao only reason people listen to forever is em. Nit cause drakes soft ass. Not weezys overrated  ass, and definetly not kanye bitch ass
Um, this guy knows what he is talking about! Rap God is the only song by Eminem, that I can't do.
Bitch, Eminem is the reason why I put the mic down and flip burgers at your mom's house.
Kenny, are you serious!?. Fuckin Kenneth! Ken! Kennifer!
Kenny Lomas your crazy if you think anything they said was better than his verse, especially Kanye's and waynes were the worst you needa go re-listen to that track
Pretty sure drake and lil Wayne had to rewrite their verses after hearing Em's verse for forever

I have said this for years.. If Eminem is featured on a song it automatically becomes an Eminem song. Even if he just has one bar. If Eminem breathes in the booth while you're recording you owe him a royalty free every time that song gets played.
Makes me laugh how Eminem fans think everything he does is fire. Dude hasn't been hot for years.
I can say the same thing about your mom.
Including the dude part. Dude.
Chris Hewztun kennifer LMFAO #DEAD
You guys killed Kenny! You bastards!
On Big Sean's Control Kenny has the best verse of all time.
Hey Matthew Andino Em hasn't made a classic album in 15 years, likely before you were born if that caterpillar above your lip is anything to go by.
Song made him a Guinness world record holder 👌most words in a hit single 1,560 words in 6 minutes, 4 seconds. That's pretty dope

If you think  he sucks so much Kenny then why defend yourself?  We all  know  that  people  who tell the truth don't need to defend themselves... let's see you do a cover of rap  God. .. what's that? Oh you can't? Must he slow down his flow so you can understand  the words?
nothing compared to em but krazy bone also drops a mad rap to the rap god beat should hear listen to it if you havent
I'm 23. And I yeah I know. It's a sexy ass caterpillar. I hope you crawl out of that cave you're in once in a while to stop trolling..if your profile pic is any indication.
Kenny Lomas he still hot from years before. N wt about rest rapers they faded n forgotten but not Em
LOL... WTF...
